projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Is it possible to add VLC to the contributed modules so it's accessible through Titanium Mobile? This would probably expand the codec's you could use when playing videos & make it so you could embed a video in an app on android not just iOS.

IOS: http://git.videolan.org/?p=MobileVLC.git;a=summary

Android: http://git.videolan.org/?p=vlc-ports/android.git;a=summary

Not so much a question as a feature request I suppose. Please remove or answer with the proper place to ask feature requests.
fields.summary: VLC module wrapper for Titanium Mobile
